title: BIODEV2030 Backs Ethiopia’s Nature
desc: On 7 February 2026, Bishoftu, Ethiopia, hosted the fourth national stakeholder workshop under the BIODEV2030 project. title: Thomas Frank sacked by Tottenham after eight months in charge
desc: Spurs are winless in their last eight league games and have won just two of their last 17.

title: The Commission sets up the European Ocean Board and calls for experts to advise on ocean policy
desc: The European Commission is calling for applications for the High-Level European Ocean Board, a new expert group established under the European Ocean Pact.

title: With eyes on trade deals and reform in global governance, Lula heads to India with 260 firms
desc: Lula leads Brazil's largest-ever business delegation to India, aiming for trade deals and global governance reforms amidst geopolitical challenges.

title: Tanzania, Somalia deepen ties, establish a body to boost trade, investment.
desc: DAR ES SALAAM: TANZANIA, and Somalia have agreed to strengthen diplomatic ties by establishing a Joint Cooperation Commission to boost trade and investments. title: Russian drone strike kills three Ukrainian toddlers and their father
desc: Three toddlers and their father were killed in a Russian drone strike in eastern Ukraine that also injured their pregnant mother and their grandmother, local emergency services said.

title: Violin finalists announced for the 2026 International Mozart Competition
desc: Three violinists compete for the €10,000 first prize in Salzburg, Austria
